files.patch:
@@ -45,0 +45,1 @@
+  SYSROOT_FLAGS :=
@@ -46,0 +47,7 @@
+  $(eval MINGW_VERSION = $(shell $(MINGW_BASE)-gcc -v 2>&1 | grep "gcc version" | cut -d" " -f 3))
+  $(eval MINGW_SYSROOT = $(shell $(MINGW_BASE)-gcc -print-sysroot))
+  ifeq ($(MINGW_SYSROOT), )
+    MINGW_SYSROOT := /usr/$(MINGW_BASE)
+  else
+    SYSROOT_FLAGS := --sysroot=$(MINGW_SYSROOT)
+  endif
@@ -52,2 +60,2 @@
-      SYSROOT_CFLAGS := --sysroot=/usr/$(MINGW_BASE)/sys-root, \
-      SYSROOT_LDFLAGS := --sysroot=/usr/$(MINGW_BASE)/sys-root, \
+      SYSROOT_CFLAGS := $(SYSROOT_FLAGS), \
+      SYSROOT_LDFLAGS := $(SYSROOT_FLAGS), \
@@ -69,3 +77,3 @@
-  HSDIS_TOOLCHAIN_LDFLAGS := -L/usr/lib/gcc/$(MINGW_BASE)/9.2.0 \
-      -L/usr/$(MINGW_BASE)/sys-root/mingw/lib
-  MINGW_DLLCRT := /usr/$(MINGW_BASE)/sys-root/mingw/lib/dllcrt2.o
+  HSDIS_TOOLCHAIN_LDFLAGS := -L/usr/lib/gcc/$(MINGW_BASE)/$(MINGW_VERSION) \
+      -L$(MINGW_SYSROOT)/lib
+  MINGW_DLLCRT := $(MINGW_SYSROOT)/lib/dllcrt2.o
